name: SAMVEDNA

address: Tagore Town, In Front Of Colonelganj Inter College,

briefDescription: trust provide complete rehabilitation of children with physical disability specially cerebral palsy . in last 6 year trust has treated more than 1000 children with cerebral palsy with excellent outcome, has carried out more than 50 cme and 50 camps in various part of northern India, & one national conference (CPCON2010).

address: In Front Of Prayag Mahila Vidya Peeth Civil Line
